25/* Copy a regular file: from src_filename to dest_filename.
26 The destination file is assumed to be a backup file.
27 Modification times, owner, group and access permissions are preserved as
28 far as possible.
29 Exit upon failure. */
30extern void copy_file_preserving (const char *src_filename, const char *dest_filename);
31
32
33#ifdef __cplusplus
34}
35#endif
